s: 2 weeks ago - Iveco (stylized in all caps as IVECO) was incorporated on 1 January 1975, with the merger of five different brands: FIAT Veicoli Industriali (with headquarters in Turin), OM (Brescia, Italy), Lancia Veicoli Speciali (Italy), Unic (France), and Magirus-Deutz (Germany).
Iveco Group is a global automotive leader active in the Commercial & Specialty Vehicles, Powertrain, and related Financial Services arenas.
